name: A Good Day to Die Hard
summary: A Good Day to Die Hard is a 2D side-scrolling action game based on A Good Day to Die Hard, the fifth in the series of action movies. The game consists of several levels, playing as John or Jack McClane, and there are eight environments in total. The character needs to be guided through the environment, shooting or punching opponents and overcoming obstacles with platform based gameplay.
